title: Aku no Kadou wo Ikimashou
description: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...

altTitles.ja: 悪の華道を行きましょう

altTitles.en: Let's Go on the Evil Runway

altTitles.pt-br: Vamos andar de mãos dadas pelo caminho florido para a maldade?

altTitles.es: ¿Caminamos de la mano por el camino florido del mal?

altTitles.hu: Nem sétálunk le kézen fogva a gonoszság virágos útján?

altTitles.th: เส้นทางปีศาจที่งดงามนั่นน่ะ จะไปด้วยกันดีไหม?

altTitles.id: Akankah kita berjalan begandengan tangan di jalan kejahatan yang berbunga?
Mari kita berjalan sembari bergandengan turun ke jalan kejahatan yang berbunga-bunga

altTitles.vi: Hãy cùng đi trên con đường hoa của ác quỷ
